author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-512: Added TikaEngine to the "language" EnhancementChain part of the default configuration of the stable, full and full-war launchers

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-512: Unit Test do no longer to depend on the time zone of the host. Tests now use log4j for logging. This allows to log debug level loggings of the Tika Engine.

author: adrianc
msg: Minor changes to ScriptUtil.java: add private constructor, make class final, code format changes. No functional change.

msg: CAMEL-5059: Added mockEndpointsAndSkip to advice with and test kit.
